channel.title: Dungeoneering

item.title: Dungeoneering
item.dc:creator: @Owner_satan Owner satan
item.description:
@Owner_satan wrote:

I have most of this I just have a simple error that I cannot figure out. Whenever I kill the boss, the server crashes. Here is my code inside my npchandler class.

public void handleDungFloor1(int i) { Client c = (Client)Server.playerHandler.players[npcs[i].spawnedBy]; c.getItems().addItem(16963, 1); c.floor1 = 1; c.sendMessage("Congratulations on completing floor 1! You can now go out the ladder."); c.getPA().resetFloor1(); c.waveId = 300; }
and if (npcs[i].npcType == 6105) { handleDungFloor1(i); }
Here is my playerassistant class portion:

public void resetFloor1() { c.waveId = -1; c.getPA().movePlayer(3231,9294,0); } I did kind of rip this off of how jad works, if that matters at all. Thanks in advance.

Read full topic
